Title: Windy.DragonCurve
Description:
Windy.DragonCurve is visualization tool of dragon curves.
It provides a platform to generate all kinds of dragon curves by providing different Dragon Curve Scheme, whose description is very similar to its mathematical description.
It is developed in C# and WPF 4.0

Project Description
Windy.DragonCurve is visualization tool of dragon curves.
It provides a platform to generate all kinds of dragon curves by providing different Dragon Curve Scheme, whose description is very similar to its mathematical description.
It is developed in C# and WPF 4.0
